casebody.data:
The People, etc., ex rel. John J. Gilroy, Relator, Appellant v. Charles F. MacLean, et al., Commissioners, etc., Respondents. Decided July 5, 1892. Appeal by writ of certiorari by relator from judgment of the board of police commissioners dismissing him from the police force of the city of New York. Louis J. Grant, for relator, appellant. William H. Clark, counsel to the corporation, and William A. Sweetser of counsel, for respondents.

Before Freedman, P. J., and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Opinion by Dugro, J., Freedman, P. J., and Gildersleeve, J., concurred. Judgment of commissioners affirmed, and writ dismissed, with $50 costs and disbursements.
